titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide for consideration of the ability of an applicant for a stormwater permit to pay, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2724)

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: 10/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency or a State, in issuing permits for discharges from municipal storm sewers, to consider the ability of the applicant to pay to meet permit requirements and the environmental impact of the issuance of the permit at the site of the discharge.
